00032 namespace OpenSim {
00033 
00034 #define TINY_NUMBER 0.0000001
00035 #define ROUNDOFF_ERROR 0.0000000000002
00036 #define MAX(a,b) ((a)>=(b)?(a):(b))
00037 #define MIN(a,b) ((a)<=(b)?(a):(b))
00038 #define DABS(a) ((a)>(double)0.0?(a):(-(a)))
00039 #define DSIGN(a) ((a)>=0.0?(1):(-1))
00040 #define SQR(x)  ((x) * (x))
00041 #define EQUAL_WITHIN_ERROR(a,b) (DABS(((a)-(b))) <= ROUNDOFF_ERROR)
00042 #define NOT_EQUAL_WITHIN_ERROR(a,b) (DABS(((a)-(b))) > ROUNDOFF_ERROR)
00043 #define EQUAL_WITHIN_TOLERANCE(a,b,c) (DABS(((a)-(b))) <= (c))
00044 #define MAKE_3DVECTOR(pt1,pt2,pt3) {pt3[0]=pt2[0]-pt1[0];pt3[1]=pt2[1]-pt1[1];pt3[2]=pt2[2]-pt1[2];}
00045 #define MAKE_3DVECTOR21(pt1,pt2,pt3) {pt3[0]=pt1[0]-pt2[0];pt3[1]=pt1[1]-pt2[1];pt3[2]=pt1[2]-pt2[2];}
00046 #define COPY_1X3VECTOR(from,to) {\
00047 to[0] = from[0];\
00048 to[1] = from[1];\
00049 to[2] = from[2];\
00050 }
00051 #define CALC_DETERMINANT(m) (((m[0][0]) * ((m[1][1])*(m[2][2]) - (m[1][2])*(m[2][1]))) - \
00052 ((m[0][1]) * ((m[1][0])*(m[2][2]) - (m[1][2])*(m[2][0]))) + \
00053 ((m[0][2]) * ((m[1][0])*(m[2][1]) - (m[1][1])*(m[2][0]))))
00054 
00055 } // end of namespace OpenSim
